Class GlobalValueTemplatesComposer

All Implemented Interfaces:
ImportSpecScriptListener, java.io.Serializable, org.zkoss.zk.ui.event.EventListener, org.zkoss.zk.ui.util.ComponentActivationListener, org.zkoss.zk.ui.util.ComponentCloneListener, org.zkoss.zk.ui.util.Composer, org.zkoss.zk.ui.util.ComposerExt
public class GlobalValueTemplatesComposer
extends EssentialImportInterface

This class is the UI controller for the modal dialog used to create and edit common templates for values that are re-used across Essential imports, e.g. a common naming convention for instances of a given relationship class

Version:
1.0 - 28.06.2011
Author:
Joson Powell
See Also:
